recipe_title_help.message: allow you to give the recipe name

recipe_vegetarian_help.message: indicates whether recipe is vegetarian or not

recipe_ingredientshelp.message: indicates the complete list of ingredients in the recipe preparation

recipe_peoplenumberhelp.message: indicates the number of quantities for

recipe_preparation_help.message: details of the preparation of the recipe, order cooking etc ...

recipe_preparationtime_help.message: time (in minutes) needed to prepare the recipe

recipe_restimeunit_help.message: sets the unit for rest time

recipe_picture_picker_title.message: choose an image to illustrate the recipe

recipe_cost_help.message: type of budget for the recipe
